until (n, m = gets.split.map(&:to_i)).all?(&:zero?)
  degree = Array.new(n, 0)
  m.times do
    u, v = gets.split.map{|i| i.to_i - 1}
    degree[u] += 1
    degree[v] += 1
  end
  puts degree.all?{|i| i <= 2} ? "yes" : "no"
end

loop do
  n, m = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
  break if n==0 and m==0
  es = Array.new(n+1){[]}
  m.times{
    a, b = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
    es[a] << b
    es[b] << a
  }
  if m>=n or es.any?{|a| a.size>2}
    puts "no"
    next
  end
  visited = Array.new(n+1){false}
  dfs = ->x{
    es[x].each{|y|
      if not visited[y]
        visited[y] = true
        dfs[y]
      end
    }
  }
  (1..n).each{|i|
    if es[i].size==0
      visited[i] = true
    elsif es[i].size==1
      visited[i] = true
      dfs[i]
    end
  }
  visited[0] = true
  if visited.all?
    puts "yes"
  else
    puts "no"
  end
end

# AOJ 0251: Magic Square
# Python3 2018.6.25 bal4u

# UNION-FIND library
class UnionSet:
	def __init__(self, nmax):
		self.size = [1]*nmax
		self.id = [i for i in range(nmax+1)]
	def root(self, i):
		while i != self.id[i]:
			self.id[i] = self.id[self.id[i]]
			i = self.id[i]
		return i
	def connected(self, p, q): return self.root(p) == self.root(q)
	def unite(self, p, q):
		i, j = self.root(p), self.root(q)
		if i == j: return
		if self.size[i] < self.size[j]:
			self.id[i] = j
			self.size[j] += self.size[i]
		else:
			self.id[j] = i
			self.size[i] += self.size[j]
# UNION-FIND library

while True:
	n, m = map(int, input().split())
	if n == 0: break
	n += 1
	u = UnionSet(n)
	f = [0]*n
	ans = True
	for i in range(m):
		if ans:
			a, b = map(int, input().split())
			f[a] += 1
			f[b] += 1
			if f[a] > 2: ans = False
			if f[b] > 2: ans = False
			if u.connected(a, b): ans = False
			u.unite(a, b)
		else: input()
	print("yes" if ans else "no")
